name: Fairy Hunter
description:
Long ago, In this world kind of intelligent life -- fairy. At first humans and fairy lived in peace. I do not know when to start, part of the evil fairy began to hurt people. Human mages began to imprison and train fairy to adopted them as pets. This part of humanity is called the Fairy Hunter.

This is a role-playing game. The player is about to enter a mysterious world. There are two races, human and fairy. Players need to hunt evil fairy and adopted them as pets. Thus gaining greater ability to hunt higher level fairy.
· 3D vision
· Exquisite character modeling
· Open World
· Real-time action combat
· Gorgeous attack animation
